name: Ocean Cleaner (PixelDev)
description:
Step 1: Download the zip file.

Step 2: Open the zip file.

Step 3: Open the application and click extract all.

Step 4: A window should pop up with the extracted application.

Step 5: Open it and have fun! -- Press F for fullscreen and Escape to exit fullscreen :)

Old account: Cursedcraft. Got Deleted for some reason :(
